Name: PickupSelection
Text: Whoa! They dropped some nice items. Let's pick one!

Name: RemoveItemSelection
Text: My chance to get rid of one of these items!

Name: SkipAndHeal
Text: Do you want to skip and heal {0}% percent of HP ({1})?

Name: LuggageUpgradeSelect
Text: Time to prepare myself for the upcoming battles!

Name: Stranded
Text: Nooo! You are left at the airport and you need to find your way home! Luckily you have some items packed.//Use them to clear your way home!

Name: Attack!
Text: Attacking makes items slide towards the red luggage border. Items that hit the border will attack. //The red numbers show the item's damage.

Name: Breakable
Text: There are items that break when rammed by another item during an attack. //They all have different effects – try them out!

Name: Defend
Text: Enemies can attack your item slots. Any item in that slot will block damage using their defense.//The blue numbers show the item's defense.

Name: MoveItemHint
Text: Drag an item to swap it (Costs 1 Action Point)

Name: Gameover
Text: You died! But don't worry, some of your collections and your upgrades will stay with you for your next run!

Name: WinGame
Text: You win! Thanks for playing! You can keep playing the game if you want!
